Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/90th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

Allow extra travel time.
